about_the_game:
**Requires a DX12 compatible GPU**

A passion project years in the making.


With big inspiration from older tactical games but having the freedom to break all of the rules (and walls), EVOTACTICS aims to evolve the third person shooter genre with unique ideas, game modes, and gameplay.

▶FULLY NETWORKED DESTRUCTION


Destruction in EVOTACTICS is fully networked across player's machines. Use a variety of special explosives to create your own entry points for you and your team. Utilizing explosives is just one way to get around a problem. EVOTACTICS is designed to be able to handle very large destructible environments.

▶LIGHTS OUT


Breaking lights allows you to use the shadows to your advantage. Lights block vision while using night vision goggles. Pick and choose the lights you kill for strategic reasons.

content_descriptors.notes: EVOTACTICS contains depictions of killing, violence, and war.

name: EVOTACTICS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 4-Core 3.0Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 4-Core 4.0Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space

short_description: Tactical warfare meets extremely destructible environments. EVOTACTICS is a dynamic stealth-action third person shooter inspired by the classics. Breach, clear, and create new lines of attack in every situation.
